title: i would be happy if {{champion:136}} was just deleted.... he is a disgrace.
body:
{{champion:136}} is more a joke than heimer is now... 


still dont know how people are feeding him.. i fight him with even sol and wreck him with little effort...

replies.body: Excuse me, but you made a typo. Yasuo's code number is 157.
I'd be upset if they removed Yasuo. Seeing such an untertuned champion bounce across the Rift and flounder miserably brings me great joy.
countered hard by every champ in the game with higher movespeed or a dash... with is 80% of the entire pool.
whats wrong with our boop boop boop ?
